mapper.select: select zoo_id, zoo_name, description, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, creator, updater, deleter from zoo where zoo_id = #{zooId} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into zoo(zoo_name, description, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, creator, updater, deleter) values (#{zooName}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{creator}, #{updater}, #{deleter})
mapper.update:
update zoo
zoo_name = #{zooName},
description = #{description},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
creator = #{creator},
updater = #{updater},
deleter = #{deleter},
where zoo_id = #{zooId}
